title: Personal Loan - Salaried Professionals

title: Business Expansion Loan
description: Loans up to ₹15 Lakhs for small business owners with flexible EMI options.

description: Exclusive offer to increase your loan limit by up to 30% with easy processing.

title: Home Renovation Loan
description: Finance your home improvements at attractive rates starting from 9.9%.

title: Festival Offer - Instant Personal Loan
description: Limited time festive offer: Instant approval up to ₹5 Lakhs, minimal documentation.
eligibility: For verified customers with income above ₹50,000/month.
